name: Organic Tomato Seeds
description: High-quality, non-GMO organic tomato seeds. Perfect for home gardens and small farms. Produces juicy, flavorful tomatoes.

name: Heavy-Duty Garden Hoe
description: A durable garden hoe with a solid oak handle and a sharp, carbon steel blade. Ideal for weeding and cultivating soil.

name: All-Purpose Plant Fertilizer
description: A balanced, all-purpose fertilizer that promotes healthy growth for a wide variety of plants, vegetables, and flowers.

name: Watering Can (2 Gallon)
description: A sturdy 2-gallon watering can with a detachable sprinkler head. Made from weather-resistant plastic.

name: Heirloom Carrot Seeds
description: A mix of colorful heirloom carrot seeds including purple, yellow, and white varieties. Fun for the whole family.

name: Leather Work Gloves
description: Durable and comfortable leather work gloves to protect your hands during tough farm and garden tasks.
